BriefDescription: The L1 cache was reloaded with a line that fulfills a prefetch request.
Load finished without experiencing an L1 miss.
Cycles in which Superslice 0 dispatches either 1 or 2 instructions.
Cycles dispatch is held because of a synchronizing instruction that requires the ICT to be empty before dispatch.
Cycles in which the thread is in Adjunct state. MSR[S HV PR] bits = 011.
All L1 D cache load references counted at finish, gated by reject. In P9 and earlier this event counted only cacheable loads but in P10 both cacheable and non-cacheable loads are included.
PowerPC instruction completed while the thread was in Adjunct state.
Conditional store instruction (STCX) finished. LARX and STCX are instructions used to acquire a lock.
Cycles in which Superslice 1 dispatches either 1 or 2 instructions.
Cycles in which Superslice 1 dispatches either 3 or 4 instructions.
PowerPC instruction dispatched.
Demand instruction cache miss.
LSU Finished an internal operation in ST2 port.
PowerPC instruction completed while the thread was in Privileged state.
Cycles in which Superslice 0 dispatches either 3 or 4 instructions.
Cycles in which Superslice 0 dispatches either 5, 6, 7 or 8 instructions.
Counts all instruction cache prefetch reloads (includes demand turned into prefetch).
The L1 cache was reloaded with a line that fulfills a demand miss request. Counted at reload time, before finish.
The processor's data cache was reloaded from a source other than the local core's L1, L2, or L3 due to a demand miss.
Counts all instruction cache reloads includes demand, prefetch, prefetch turned into demand and demand turned into prefetch.
Vector load instruction completed.
A branch completed. All branches are included.
Load missed L1, counted at finish time.
The processor's data cache was reloaded from local, remote, or distant memory due to a demand miss.
